oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT 
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(CLIENT_ID) CLIENT_ID,
c.CLT_TYPE,
YN_HEALTH_WARNING,
TO_CHAR(LAST_VALID_ADDRESS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') LAST_VALID_ADDRESS_DATE,
YN_VALID_ADDRESS,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(NAME) NAME,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(UPPERCASE_NAME) UPPERCASE_NAME,
c.MODIFIED_BY,
TO_CHAR(c.MODIFIED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MODIFIED_DATE,
YN_VALIDATED_BY_GBMAIL,
TOWN,
COUNTY,
COU_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,
COU_NATIONALITY_COUNTRY,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(MAIL_ADDRESS1) MAIL_ADDRESS1,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(MAIL_ADDRESS2) MAIL_ADDRESS2,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(MAIL_ADDRESS3) MAIL_ADDRESS3,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(POSTCODE) POSTCODE,
REPLACE(TELEPHONE_NUMBER,TELEPHONE_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') TELEPHONE_NUMBER,
REPLACE(FAX_NUMBER,FAX_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') FAX_NUMBER,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(SORTCODE) SORTCODE,
TO_CHAR(ADDRESS_CHANGE_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') ADDRESS_CHANGE_DATE,
ACCOUNT_BALANCE,
WRITE_OFF_VALUE,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME) BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME,
BANK_NAME,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(BANK_SORT_CODE) BANK_SORT_CODE,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER) BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
TTL_TITLE,
ADVANCE_BALANCE,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(COMPANY_NAME) COMPANY_NAME,
TELEX_NUMBER,
CONTACT_NAME,
YN_FINANCIAL_PROCESSING,
FIN_COMPANY,
FIN_BUS_UNIT,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(FIN_ACC_CODE) FIN_ACC_CODE,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(FIN_SUB_ACC_CODE) FIN_SUB_ACC_CODE,
FIN_VENDOR,
YN_USE_ALT_ADDRESS,
YN_ALT_VALID_ADDRESS,
YN_ALT_VALID_BY_GBMAIL,
ALT_COMPANY_NAME,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ALT_MAIL_ADDRESS1) ALT_MAIL_ADDRESS1,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ALT_MAIL_ADDRESS2) ALT_MAIL_ADDRESS2,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ALT_MAIL_ADDRESS3) ALT_MAIL_ADDRESS3,
ALT_TOWN,
ALT_COUNTY,
ALT_COU_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ALT_POSTCODE) ALT_POSTCODE,
REPLACE(ALT_TELEPHONE_NUMBER,ALT_TELEPHONE_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') ALT_TELEPHONE_NUMBER,
REPLACE(ALT_FAX_NUMBER,ALT_FAX_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') ALT_FAX_NUMBER,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ALT_SORTCODE) ALT_SORTCODE,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(SURNAME) SURNAME,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(FIRST_NAME) FIRST_NAME,
JOB_TITLE,
ALT_JOB_TITLE,
LWC_LEGAL_CODE,
YN_BENEVOLENT_DONATION,
YN_USE_ALT_ADD_FOR_DOM,
YN_REC_THIRD_PARTY_MAIL,
YN_MAIL_FOR_EVENTS,
YN_DIVULGE_INFO,
HONOURS,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(EMAIL_ADDRESS) EMAIL_ADDRESS,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ALT_EMAIL_ADDRESS) ALT_EMAIL_ADDRESS,
ALT_TELEX_NUMBER,
TO_CHAR(ALT_ADDRESS_CHANGE_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') ALT_ADDRESS_CHANGE_DATE,
EEC_VAT_NO,
POST_REGION,
ALT_POST_REGION,
ADDRESS_CHANGED_BY,
ALT_ADDRESS_CHANGED_BY,
TO_CHAR(ALT_LAST_VALID_ADDRESS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') ALT_LAST_VALID_ADDRESS_DATE,
YN_ALT_RESIDENTIAL_ADDRESS,
YN_RESIDENTIAL_ADDRESS,
COM_ALT_PRACTICE_ADDRESS_ID,
COM_PRACTICE_ADDRESS_ID,
TO_CHAR(AOCT_PASS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') AOCT_PASS_DATE,
DAC_DIB_CODE,
TO_CHAR(FPC_PASS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') FPC_PASS_DATE,
TO_CHAR(IBOC_PASS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') IBOC_PASS_DATE,
TO_CHAR(JIEB_EXAM_PASS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') JIEB_EXAM_PASS_DATE,
TO_CHAR(POCT_DAY_1_PASS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') POCT_DAY_1_PASS_DATE,
TO_CHAR(POCT_DAY_2_PASS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') POCT_DAY_2_PASS_DATE,
TO_CHAR(POCT_DAY_3_PASS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') POCT_DAY_3_PASS_DATE,
BANKED_EXPERIENCE,
TO_CHAR(CARD_EXPIRY_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') CARD_EXPIRY_DATE,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(CARD_ISSUE_NUMBER) CARD_ISSUE_NUMBER,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(CARD_NUMBER) CARD_NUMBER,
ENABLING_BOND_POLICY_NO,
TO_CHAR(IPC_ISSUED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') IPC_ISSUED_DATE,
LOCAL_PC_BODY,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(PII_COMPANY_NAME) PII_COMPANY_NAME,
PII_POLICY_NO,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(UPPERCASE_SURNAME) UPPERCASE_SURNAME,
YN_IPC,
YN_LOCAL_PC,
YN_EXCLUDE_JOURNAL,
TO_CHAR(FIRST_AUDIT_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') FIRST_AUDIT_DATE,
TO_CHAR(ENABLING_BOND_EXPIRY_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') ENABLING_BOND_EXPIRY_DATE,
PRD_CATEGORY,
PIC_COMPANY_NAME,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(WEB_PASSWORD) WEB_PASSWORD,
YN_RELEASE_DETAILS_MARKETING,
YN_INSERTED_PROFILE_DB,
IR_SOURCE,
EMAIL_CONSENT_LEVEL,
YN_PREVENT_ONLINE_PAYMENT,
DEPARTMENT_TITLE,
SINGLE_CLIENT_HUB_REFRESH,
REPLACE(MOBILE_NUMBER,MOBILE_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') MOBILE_NUMBER,
MOBILE_COUNTRY_CODE,
YN_ACCA_EMPLOYERS,
YN_RESULTS_BY_SMS,
YN_UPDATES_BY_SMS,
PCD_MAIL_CODE,
EMAIL_VAL_RESULT,
PHONE_VAL_RESULT,
MOBILE_VAL_RESULT,
TO_CHAR(PHONE_VALIDATED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') PHONE_VALIDATED_DATE,
TO_CHAR(EMAIL_VALIDATED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') EMAIL_VALIDATED_DATE,
TO_CHAR(MOBILE_VALIDATED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MOBILE_VALIDATED_DATE,
REPLACE(VALIDATED_MOBILE_NUMBER,VALIDATED_MOBILE_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') VALIDATED_MOBILE_NUMBER,
REPLACE(VALIDATED_PHONE_NUMBER,VALIDATED_PHONE_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') VALIDATED_PHONE_NUMBER,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(VALIDATED_EMAIL_ADDRESS) VALIDATED_EMAIL_ADDRESS,
ct.TCA_PARTY_TYPE
FROM registry.clients c
inner join registry.client_types ct on c.clt_type = ct.type
WHERE  c.modified_date between TO_DATE(','''',activity('WaterMarkProdClients').output.firstRow.EXTRACT_DATE,'''',',''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'')',
'AND TO_DATE(','''',activity('CurrentTimeProdClients').output.firstRow.SOURCE_TIMESTAMP,'''',',''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'')',';')

@concat('SELECT
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(CLI_CLIENT_ID) CLI_CLIENT_ID,
CLA_CLASSIFICATION,
CLV_VALUE,
MODIFIED_BY,
TO_CHAR(MODIFIED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MODIFIED_DATE,
DATE_VALID,
SINGLE_CLIENT_HUB_REFRESH
FROM registry.CLIENT_CLASSIFICATIONS cc
WHERE cc.cli_client_id not in (''0466075'',''0870492'',''1646099'')  
and cc.modified_date between TO_DATE(','''',activity('WaterMarkProdClientsClassification').output.firstRow.EXTRACT_DATE,'''',',''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'')',
'AND TO_DATE(','''',activity('CurrentTimeProdClientsClassification').output.firstRow.SOURCE_TIMESTAMP,'''',',''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'')',';')

REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(CLI_CLIENT_ID) CLI_CLIENT_ID,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(FIRST_NAME) FIRST_NAME,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(SURNAME) SURNAME,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(UPPERCASE_SURNAME) UPPERCASE_SURNAME,
LAW_LAW_VARIANT_CODE,
JSC_JOINT_SCHEME,
''01-JAN-1990'' BIRTH_DATE,

SBM_SUBMETHOD,
GEN_GENDER,
ACT_ACTIVITY,
MODIFIED_BY,
TO_CHAR(MODIFIED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MODIFIED_DATE,
TO_CHAR(SES_SESSION_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') SES_SESSION_DATE,
COM_CLIENT_ID,
SPR_SPECIAL_PROJECT_CODE,
CLI_CLIENT_ID_EB,
TO_CHAR(MSER_TO_STUDENT_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MSER_TO_STUDENT_DATE,
TO_CHAR(GRADUATION_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') GRADUATION_DATE,
TO_CHAR(ASSOCIATE_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') ASSOCIATE_DATE,
TO_CHAR(DIPLOMA_PASSEE_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') DIPLOMA_PASSEE_DATE,
TO_CHAR(DIPLOMA_HOLDER_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') DIPLOMA_HOLDER_DATE,
TO_CHAR(FELLOW_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') FELLOW_DATE,
TO_CHAR(RETIREMENT_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') RETIREMENT_DATE,
TO_CHAR(SUSPENSION_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') SUSPENSION_DATE,
SUR_SUSPENSION_REASON,
RER_REINSTATEMENT_REASON,

SEL_SERVICE_LEVEL,
POSTFIX,
SBF_SUBQUERY_FLAG,
YN_SUBSCRIPTION_RAISED,
TO_CHAR(PREVIOUS_REG_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') PREVIOUS_REG_DATE,

TO_CHAR(DHO_COMMITTEE_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') DHO_COMMITTEE_DATE,
DHO_CERTIFICATE_NUMBER,
TO_CHAR(MODULE_E_REFERRAL_EXPIRES,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MODULE_E_REFERRAL_EXPIRES,
TO_CHAR(MODULE_F_REFERRAL_EXPIRES,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MODULE_F_REFERRAL_EXPIRES,
SUSPENSION_QUERY_FLAG,
AUTOMATIC_SUSPENSION_FLAG,
YN_SUB_DEMAND_PRINTED,
TO_CHAR(REJECTION_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') REJECTION_DATE,
RJR_REJECTION_REASON,
AUTOMATIC_REMINDER_FLAG,
AUTOMATIC_SUSPENSION_CATEGORY,
ENR_ENTRY_ROUTE,
MTY_MEMBER_TYPE,

INSTALMENTS_AGREED_BY,
TO_CHAR(INSTALMENTS_AGREED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') INSTALMENTS_AGREED_DATE,
DEFERRED_BY,

DFR_DEFERRAL_CODE,
DEFERRAL_COMMENT,
TO_CHAR(ASSOCIATE_NOTIFICATION,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') ASSOCIATE_NOTIFICATION,
INSOLVENCY_SERVICE_NUMBER,
TO_CHAR(FELLOW_DUE_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') FELLOW_DUE_DATE,
YN_PERMANENT_GRADUATE,
YN_IN_PRACTICE,
YN_QUERY_PRACTICE,
ETO_ETHNIC_ORIGIN,
CNT_CONTACT_ID,
LAW_ACC_AUDIT_VARIANT_CODE,
YN_VARIANT_CHANGE_ACKNOWLEDGED,
YN_ACC,
YN_IL,
MSER_TRANSFER_TYPE,
TO_CHAR(COM_CLIENT_ID_CHANGED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') COM_CLIENT_ID_CHANGED_DATE,

ACR_ACTIVITY_REASON,

TO_CHAR(CAT_HOLDER_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') CAT_HOLDER_DATE,
GRADUATE_TYPE,
RSR_REDUCED_SUB_REASON_CODE,
TO_CHAR(SPECIAL_GRAD_EXPIRY,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') SPECIAL_GRAD_EXPIRY,
SRE_SUBSCRIPTION_RATE,

YN_RETIRED,
TO_CHAR(AUTOMATIC_SUSPENSION_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') AUTOMATIC_SUSPENSION_DATE,
TO_CHAR(TRANSFER_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') TRANSFER_DATE,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(TRAINING_MANAGER) TRAINING_MANAGER,
YN_INSERTED_PROFILE_DB,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(TRAINING_MANAGER_EMAIL) TRAINING_MANAGER_EMAIL,
YN_EMAIL_RESULTS,
YN_ACCELERATED_FELLOW,
SPR_ADD_REMOVE_FLAG,
VAR_STREAM_UPDATE_FLAG,
YN_ACCA_EXCHANGE,
YN_AFFILIATE_LIST,
TO_CHAR(DIPIFR_PASSEE_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') DIPIFR_PASSEE_DATE,
TO_CHAR(DIPIFR_HOLDER_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') DIPIFR_HOLDER_DATE,
YN_ONLINE_CPD_SUBMISSION,
TO_CHAR(VAR_STREAM_SESSION,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') VAR_STREAM_SESSION,
YN_22_GLOBAL,
SINGLE_CLIENT_HUB_REFRESH,
TO_CHAR(ORIGINAL_LAST_SESSION,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') ORIGINAL_LAST_SESSION,
YN_REM_BY_SMS,
YN_RESULTS_BY_SMS,

FIA_CONVERSION_OPTION,

WHERE  rp.modified_date between TO_DATE(','''',activity('WaterMarkProdRegisteredClients').output.firstRow.EXTRACT_DATE,'''',',''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'')',
'AND TO_DATE(','''',activity('CurrentTimeProdRegisteredClients').output.firstRow.SOURCE_TIMESTAMP,'''',',''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'')',';')

@concat('SELECT
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(CLI_CLIENT_ID) CLI_CLIENT_ID,
ADDRESS_NUMBER,
COU_COUNTRY,
MODIFIED_BY,
TO_CHAR(MODIFIED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MODIFIED_DATE,
YN_RESIDENTIAL_ADDRESS,
YN_BUSINESS_ADDRESS,
YN_VALID_ADDRESS,
YN_USE_FOR_DOM,
YN_MAILING_ADDRESS,
YN_ALTERNATE_ADDRESS,
YN_SPARE_TIME_PRACTICE,
YN_HEAD_OFFICE_ADDRESS,
YN_REGISTERED_OFFICE_ADDRESS,
YN_VALIDATED_BY_QAS,
YN_POPULATED_BY_CLIENTS,
COMPANY_NAME,
JOB_TITLE,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ADDRESS_LINE_1) ADDRESS_LINE_1,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ADDRESS_LINE_2) ADDRESS_LINE_2,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(ADDRESS_LINE_3) ADDRESS_LINE_3,
TOWN,
COUNTY,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(POSTCODE) POSTCODE,
SORTCODE,
POST_REGION,
REPLACE(TELEPHONE_NUMBER,TELEPHONE_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') TELEPHONE_NUMBER,
REPLACE(FAX_NUMBER,FAX_NUMBER, ''07777777777'') FAX_NUMBER,
REGISTRY.ENCRYPTION.ENCRYPT(EMAIL_ADDRESS) EMAIL_ADDRESS,
TO_CHAR(LAST_VALID_ADDRESS_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') LAST_VALID_ADDRESS_DATE,
YN_COP,
CONTINUITY_NOMINEE_TYPE,
CONTINUITY_NOMINEE_ID,
UPPERCASE_COMPANY_NAME,
DELIVERY_POINT_SUFFIX,
YN_DEDUPLICATED,
YN_PRIMARY,
YN_PREVENT_CLEANSING,
SINGLE_CLIENT_HUB_REFRESH,
SOURCE_DATA_IDENTIFIER,
ADDRESS_TYPE,
DATA_LEVEL,
POST_PROCESSING,
CLIENT_APPLICATION_NAME,
VALIDATED_BY,
TO_CHAR(VALIDATED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') VALIDATED_DATE
FROM registry.CLIENT_ADDRESSES ca
WHERE  ca.modified_date between TO_DATE(','''',activity('WaterMarkProdClientAddresses').output.firstRow.EXTRACT_DATE,'''',',''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'')',
'AND TO_DATE(','''',activity('CurrentTimeProdClientAddresses').output.firstRow.SOURCE_TIMESTAMP,'''',',''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'')',';')

source.oracleReaderQuery: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') SOURCE_TIMESTAMP FROM DUAL;
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') SOURCE_TIMESTAMP FROM DUAL;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT FORMAT(ISNULL(MAX(CAST(DATA_EXTRACT_WATERMARK_HIGH AS DATETIME)),CAST(GETDATE()-1 AS DATETIME)),'dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')  EXTRACT_DATE FROM staging.XX_ACCA_RTC_DATA_LOAD_CONTROL WHERE SOURCE_SYSTEM = 'PROD'
AND SOURCE_TABLE = 'CLIENT_CLASSIFICATIONS';

source.oracleReaderQuery: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') SOURCE_TIMESTAMP FROM DUAL;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT FORMAT(ISNULL(MAX(CAST(DATA_EXTRACT_WATERMARK_HIGH AS DATETIME)),CAST(GETDATE()-1 AS DATETIME)),'dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')  EXTRACT_DATE FROM staging.XX_ACCA_RTC_DATA_LOAD_CONTROL WHERE SOURCE_SYSTEM = 'PROD'
AND SOURCE_TABLE = 'REGISTERED_PERSONS';

source.oracleReaderQuery: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') SOURCE_TIMESTAMP FROM DUAL;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT FORMAT(ISNULL(MAX(CAST(DATA_EXTRACT_WATERMARK_HIGH AS DATETIME)),CAST(GETDATE()-1 AS DATETIME)),'dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')  EXTRACT_DATE FROM staging.XX_ACCA_RTC_DATA_LOAD_CONTROL WHERE SOURCE_SYSTEM = 'PROD'
AND SOURCE_TABLE = 'CLIENT_ADDRESSES';

oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT
REINSTATEMENT_REASON,
DESCRIPTION,
MODIFIED_BY,
TO_CHAR(MODIFIED_DATE,''DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'') MODIFIED_DATE
FROM registry.REINSTATEMENT_REASONS;')

source.oracleReaderQuery: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') SOURCE_TIMESTAMP FROM DUAL;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT FORMAT(ISNULL(MAX(CAST(DATA_EXTRACT_WATERMARK_HIGH AS DATETIME)),CAST(GETDATE()-1 AS DATETIME)),'dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')  EXTRACT_DATE FROM staging.XX_ACCA_RTC_DATA_LOAD_CONTROL WHERE SOURCE_SYSTEM = 'PROD'
AND SOURCE_TABLE = 'REINSTATEMENT_REASONS';

folder.name: Analytical Datawarehouse Model with File Encryption/Data Preparation Pipelines/Daily Data Interface
